mapper.select: SELECT city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', city_info_langitude as 'cityInfoLangitude', city_info_latitude as 'cityInfoLatitude', city_info_summary as 'cityInfoSummary', city_info_image as 'cityInfoImage' FROM city_info

SELECT landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', landmark_info_langitude as 'landmarkInfoLangitude', landmark_info_latitude as 'landmarkInfoLatitude', landmark_info_image as 'landmarkInfoImage' FROM landmark_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} );

SELECT eatery_no as 'eateryNo', eatery_name as 'eateryName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM eatery_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} );

SELECT stay_info_no as 'stayInfoNo', stay_info_name as 'stayInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM stay_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} );
SELECT event_info_name as 'eventInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM event_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} );
